import React from 'react' import {useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux' import {Row, Col, Button,ListGroup,Image,Card} from 'react-bootstrap' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' const PlaceOrder = () => { const dispatch=useDispatch() const cart=useSelector(state=>state.cart) const {adress,city,postalcode,country}=cart.shippingAdress return ( <>

Shipping

Adress {adress}, {city}, {postalcode}, {country}

Payment Method

{cart.paymentMethod}

 {cart.cartItems.map((item,index)=>( {item.title} {item.qty} X $ {item.price} = $ {item.qty * item.price} ))}

Order Summary

 Items {cart.itemPrice} Shipping {cart.shippingPrice} Tax {cart.taxPrice} Total {cart.totalPrice} ) } export default PlaceOrder
